name: RasterTransformer
type: Convert and merge raster data into a specific output format.

parameters.name: Input
parameters.description: Specifies the path of the input file or folder.
parameters.label: -i

parameters.name: OutputImage
parameters.description: Specifies the path of the output file or folder.
parameters.label: -o

parameters.name: OutputFormat
parameters.description: Specifies the format of the output.
parameters.label: -f

parameters.name: LocalExecution
parameters.description: Specifies whether the conversion should be executed in a local temp directory.
parameters.label: --local-execution
